author: eptwts
text:
there's a defining moment in every successful young mans life...

where he's in a position where he could comfortably burn everything down, stop working & still have enough money to live for the next 2 decades

the way you proceed after this point shows your true intentions & purpose

it's super easy to "lock in" when your survival depends on it

it's a different story when it's goes from a must -> an option

asking yourself "what would my day to day life look like if i had 8 figures in the bank" is a great thought experiment to show who you truly are deep down & what your underlying intentions behind getting rich actually are
